section.title: DNS Service Overview
section.p: DNS Service provides multi-tenant Domain Name Service with REST API management for domain and records. It is integrated with Keystone for authentication and supports PowerDNS (the default) and Bind9 without need for additional configuration.

section.title: More Information
section.p: For more information on Designate REST API's, see the OpenStack REST API Documentation
See OpenStack Glossary of terms for Designate Terminology.
